title: Recognize this free font? i need it for a gift
content:
It's a free inverted font. I need it really bad for a gift...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140118131355im_/http:/typophile.com/files/228907_6662.gif)
author: gijsgg

comments.content: It must be **[New Facebook](http://web.archive.org/web/20140118131355/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=new%20facebook%20-%20Regular&fid=23294bba98988192e4e8bba6b01ffdb7&fsize=60&text=giebels&wrap=2)** free font by Michal Vydarený (2009, [http://prask.eu/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140118131355/http:/prask.eu/ "http://prask.eu/")) + the white/yellow pattern
